mapper.select: SELECT STU_NO , STU_YEAR , STU_SEM , DECODE(STU_STATUS, 1, '재학중', 2,'휴학중', 3, '제적') STU_STATUS , MEM_NO , COLL_NO , DEPT_NO FROM STU WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STATUS_INFO WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND ING_STATUS = 'I' AND NOW_STATUS = 'E' OR NOW_STATUS = 'A'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STATUS_INFO WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND NOW_STATUS = 'A'
mapper.update: UPDATE STATUS_INFO SET ING_STATUS = 'I' , AFTER_STATUS = 'E' WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo}
mapper.select: SELECT APPLY_NO , TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPLY_DATE , DECODE(PROCESS_STATUS, 'I', '처리중', 'P', '처리완료', 'R', '반려') AS PROCESS_STATUS , STU.STU_YEAR , STU.STU_SEM , STU.STU_NO , TO_CHAR(APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPROVAL_DATE , MULTI_MAJOR_COLL , MULTI_MAJOR_DEPT , STU.COLL_NO , STU.DEPT_NO , COLL.COLL_NAME , DEPT.DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT_MANAGE, STU, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT WHERE STU.STU_NO = 'STU_002' AND STU.STU_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.STU_NO AND COLL.COLL_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.MULTI_MAJOR_COLL AND DEPT.DEPT_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.MULTI_MAJOR_DEPT

SELECT STATUS_NO , DECODE(NOW_STATUS, 'E', '재학', 'A', '휴학', 'R', '반려') AS NOW_STATUS , DECODE(AFTER_STATUS, 'E', '재학', 'A', '휴학', 'R', '반려') AS AFTER_STATUS , APPLY_DATE , APPROVAL_DATE , DECODE(ING_STATUS, 'I', '처리중', 'P', '처리완료', 'R', '반려') AS ING_STATUS , STU_NO , STATUS_CONTENT FROM STATUS_INFO WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo}
